DOC.brief_summary: To analyze the genome pattern in human gastric Intestinal Metaplasia Mucosa and duodenal Mucosa.
DOC.brief_title: Gene Expression Profiling in Human Gastric Intestinal Metaplasia Mucosa and Duodenal Mucosa
DOC.criteria: Patients scheduled for gastroendoscopy examination Esophageal, gastric or duodenal cancer or other malignancy History of upper GI tract surgery Coagulopathy or bleeding disorders Allergy to fluorescein sodium
